before_start: {"blocks":[{"key":"ue73","text":"Add 100% ethanol to MW1 and PE wash buffers as per manufacturer’s instructions.","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

creator.name: Tree of Life Genome Note Editor

description: {"blocks":[{"key":"1q764","text":"This protocol describes the automated extraction of HMW DNA from cryogenically homogenised tissue samples from plants and fungi intended for long-read sequencing. It employs the Qiagen MagAttract HMW DNA extraction kit and the Thermo Fisher KingFisher™ Apex. This process is effective for a wide variety of plant species covered by the Tree of Life Programme. The output of this protocol is HMW DNA, which, depending upon yield and genome size of the species, can be directed towards either HMW DNA Pooling or HMW DNA Fragmentation: Diagenode Megaruptor®3 for LI HiFi. This protocol was adapted from Sanger Tree of Life HMW DNA Extraction: Automated Plant MagAttract v.1 to improve sample lysis, and was updated to Sanger Tree of Life HMW DNA Extraction: Automated Plant MagAttract v.3 to include a pre-shear SPRI of the HMW DNA extracted.","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5v6re","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"28fkc","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"d1b2b","text":"Acronyms","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":8}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"dbf9p","text":"HMW: high molecular weight","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9l4mf","text":"SPRI: solid-phase reversible immobilisation","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8bpd1","text":"HiFi: high fidelity","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

groups.title: Tree of Life at the Wellcome Sanger Institute

guidelines: {"blocks":[{"key":"fuirb","text":"For the lysis buffer master mix, prepare enough for n+1 samples to allow for pipetting errors.","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":93,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"360ke","text":"Keep samples on dry ice to maintain temperature and prevent nucleic acid degradation until the lysis buffer is ready to be added to them.","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"51ni2","text":"An experienced operator can expect to comfortably process up to 32 samples, with approximately 2–3 hours handling time over a start to finish period of 4–5 hours. This estimation includes the utilisation of the KingFisher™ Apex and excludes subsequent QC checks.","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"b56sp","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ak473","text":"Additional Notes:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":17}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6e9ke","text":"FluidX tubes are used throughout the Tree of Life programme in order to track samples, therefore rather than the microcentrifuge tubes which have been mentioned in this protocol for DNA storage, all routine DNA extracts are stored in FluidX tubes.","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"981kp","text":"Both the KingFisher™ Apex protocol script and the KFX.file have been made available for this protocol – the KFX.file requires ‘BindIx software for KingFisher Apex’ to allow the KingFisher™ Apex protocol to be viewed on a PC or laptop. Alternatively, the file can be transferred directly onto a KingFisher™ Apex instrument using a USB flash drive.","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
keywords: HMW DNA extraction,magnetic bead extraction,MagAttract,automated DNA extraction,KingFisher,plant DNA extraction,reference genome,long read sequencing

status.info: We use this protocol and it's working

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"9v0ir","text":"Prepare a lysis buffer master mix:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6koq5","text":"  ReagentVolume per samplePhosphate buffered saline (PBS)200 µLProteinase K20 µLRNase A4 µLBuffer AL150 µL","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":106}],"data":{}},{"key":"4q14q","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"tables","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"cellsMeta":{"0_0":"","0_1":"","1_0":"","1_1":"","2_0":"","2_1":"","3_0":"","3_1":"","4_0":"","4_1":"","A_1":{"className":"_dt-h-center"},"A_2":{"className":"_dt-h-center"},"A_3":{"className":"_dt-h-center"},"A_4":{"className":"_dt-h-center"},"B_1":{"className":"_dt-h-center"},"B_2":{"className":"_dt-h-center"},"B_3":{"className":"_dt-h-center"},"B_4":{"className":"_dt-h-center"},"B_5":{"className":"_dt-h-center"}},"colTitles":["Reagent","Volume per sample"],"colWidths":["233.98863220214844","151.9971466064453"],"data":[["Phosphate-buffered saline (PBS)","200 µL"],["Proteinase K","20 µL"],["RNase A","4 µL"],["Buffer AL","150 µL"]],"guid":"A791D77E3EA541F78357F13EE2409D68","isJexcelDataFormat":true,"legend":"","mergeCells":{},"printData":[["Phosphate-buffered saline (PBS)","200 µL"],["Proteinase K","20 µL"],["RNase A","4 µL"],["Buffer AL","150 µL"]],"rowHeights":[23,23,23,23]}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"f43ag","text":"Transfer 50 mg of cryogenically homogenised tissue from each sample to 2 mL microcentrifuge tubes and place on dry ice to keep the samples frozen.","type":"align-left","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"2a4p2","text":"Add 374 µL of the lysis buffer master mix to each sample, then homogenise sample and mastermix by gently pipetting 10 times with a wide-bore pipette tip.","type":"align-left","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"cu0o6","text":"Centrifuge tube briefly to collect, then incubate on the heat block at 55 °C at 600 rpm for 1 hour.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"9uj45","text":"While the samples are lysing, label nine 1 mL 96-well deep-well KingFisher™ plates and fill the number of wells required for the number of samples in each plate as follows:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"di547","text":"  PlateReagent(s) requiredTip plate96-well tip comb (no reagent)Elution 2 200 µL Buffer AE Elution 1 200 µL Buffer AE NFW Wash 500 µL Nuclease-Free Water PE Wash 2700 µL Buffer PEPE Wash 1700 µL Buffer PEMW1 Wash 2700 µL Buffer MW1MW1 Wash 1700 µL Buffer MW1Sample plate15 µL Suspension G magnetic beads 280 µL Buffer MB","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":320}],"data":{}},{"key":"i36g","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"tables","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"cellsMeta":{"0_0":"","0_1":"","1_0":"","1_1":"","2_0":"","2_1":"","3_0":"","3_1":"","4_0":"","4_1":"","5_0":"","5_1":"","6_0":"","6_1":"","7_0":"","7_1":"","8_0":"","8_1":"","9_0":"","9_1":"","B_1":{"className":"_dt-h-center"},"B_2":{"className":"_dt-h-center"},"B_3":{"className":"_dt-h-center"},"B_4":{"className":"_dt-h-center"},"B_5":{"className":"_dt-h-center"},"B_6":{"className":"_dt-h-center"},"B_7":{"className":"_dt-h-center"},"B_8":{"className":"_dt-h-center"},"B_9":{"className":"_dt-h-center"}},"colTitles":["Plate","Reagent(s) required"],"colWidths":["123","273"],"data":[["Tip plate","96-well tip comb (no reagent)"],["Elution 2 ","200 µL Buffer AE "],["Elution 1 ","200 µL Buffer AE "],["NFW Wash ","500 µL nuclease-free water "],["PE Wash 2","700 µL Buffer PE"],["PE Wash 1","700 µL Buffer PE"],["MW1 Wash 2","700 µL Buffer MW1"],["MW1 Wash 1","700 µL Buffer MW1"],["Sample plate","15 µL Suspension G magnetic beads 280 µL Buffer MB"]],"guid":"7625EE3036F64039BB8C642280AB54D5","isJexcelDataFormat":true,"legend":"","mergeCells":{},"printData":[["Tip plate","96-well tip comb (no reagent)"],["Elution 2 ","200 µL Buffer AE "],["Elution 1 ","200 µL Buffer AE "],["NFW Wash ","500 µL nuclease-free water "],["PE Wash 2","700 µL Buffer PE"],["PE Wash 1","700 µL Buffer PE"],["MW1 Wash 2","700 µL Buffer MW1"],["MW1 Wash 1","700 µL Buffer MW1"],["Sample plate","15 µL Suspension G magnetic beads 280 µL Buffer MB"]],"rowHeights":[23,23,23,23,23,23,23,23,23]}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"83snm","text":"Once samples have completed lysing, remove sample tubes from the heat block and briefly centrifuge to spin down.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"dp4e6","text":"Using a wide-bore pipette tip, set the volume to 380 µL, transfer lysate from the sample tubes to individual wells in the sample plate, taking care not to transfer large pieces of debris if possible.","type":"align-left","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"cm2g8","text":"Select the required protocol in the protocol list on the KingFisher™ Apex (details in KingFisher™ Apex DNA Extraction Protocol Script/attached KFX file in the Materials section) and select using the play button.","type":"align-left","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"4dngf","text":"Load the filled plates onto the instrument following the instructions provided on screen.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"e1np8","text":"Prior to loading the “Sample Plate”, the instrument will prompt to remove the “Tip Plate”. Once the final plate is loaded, the protocol will automatically begin; this takes approximately 50 minutes.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"dilju","text":"Once the protocol has completed, follow the on-screen instructions to remove plates from the instrument.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"9rr9","text":"Inspect the elution plates for any magnetic beads in the wells. In the rare instance of magnetic beads remaining in the eluate (possible in viscous samples), these samples will need to be transferred to a 1.5 mL microcentrifuge tube and placed on a magnetic rack. Allow around 5 minutes for the beads to migrate and take the clear eluate containing the DNA using a wide-bore pipette tip.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"fasrp","text":"Using a 200 µL multi-channel pipette and wide-bore tips, pipette eluates from the elution plate into microcentrifuge tubes, pipette mix with wide-bore tips to fully homogenise DNA in the eluate.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"5kn01","text":"Perform required QC and then store the DNA at 4 °C.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

title: Sanger Tree of Life HMW DNA Extraction: Automated Plant MagAttract v.2

warning: {"blocks":[{"key":"ct4hi","text":"The operator must wear a lab coat, powder-free nitrile gloves and safety specs to perform the laboratory procedures in this protocol. Cotton glove liners are strongly recommended when handling the samples on dry ice.","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"54cpd","text":"Waste needs to be collected in a suitable container (e.g. plastic screw-top jar or Biobin) and disposed of in accordance with local regulations.","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ehovv","text":"Liquid waste needs to be collected in a suitable container (e.g. glass screw-top jar) and disposed of in accordance with local regulations.","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"c68fs","text":"Do not open the door of the KingFisher™ Apex instrument whilst it is in operation.","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
